items.name: Kaduna Green Oasis Park
items.short_description: A newly developed urban park offering lush greenery, modern play areas for children, and serene walking paths. It's a perfect escape for relaxation and family fun right in the city center.
items.address: Opposite Federal Secretariat, Independence Way, Kaduna

items.name: Arewa Contemporary Art Hub
items.short_description: This vibrant art space showcases the dynamic works of emerging and established Nigerian artists, focusing on modern and contemporary pieces. Enjoy rotating exhibitions, workshops, and a chic cafe.

items.name: Kofar Doka Culinary Village
items.short_description: Experience Kaduna's diverse flavors at this lively outdoor food village, featuring a variety of local and international cuisines. From street food to gourmet delights, it's a gastronomic adventure.
items.address: Along Sultan Bello Road, Kofar Doka, Kaduna

items.name: Zaria Road Adventureland
items.short_description: A thrilling family entertainment center boasting modern rides, interactive games, and a massive indoor play area. Perfect for kids and adults seeking an exciting day out.

items.name: Kaduna Heritage Museum & Gardens
items.short_description: Newly renovated, this museum offers an interactive journey through Kaduna's rich history and cultural heritage. Stroll through beautifully landscaped gardens that tell stories of the past.

items.name: Makarfi Square Retail & Leisure
items.short_description: Kaduna's premier modern shopping complex, featuring a wide array of local and international brands, diverse dining options, and a state-of-the-art cinema for ultimate entertainment.

items.name: Rigasa Sports & Wellness Arena
items.short_description: A cutting-edge sports complex offering facilities for various sports, a modern gym, and dedicated wellness programs. It's the ideal place for fitness enthusiasts and athletes.
items.address: Off Nnamdi Azikiwe Expressway, Rigasa, Kaduna

items.name: Innovation Kaduna Discovery Center
items.short_description: An interactive science and technology center designed to inspire curiosity in all ages. Explore hands-on exhibits, engaging workshops, and discover the wonders of innovation.

items.name: River Kaduna Eco-Lodge & Spa
items.short_description: Nestled by the serene River Kaduna, this eco-lodge offers a tranquil escape with luxurious spa services, sustainable dining, and breathtaking natural views. Perfect for a peaceful retreat.
items.address: Along Kaduna River Bank, Kajuru Road, Kaduna

items.name: Arewa Grand Convention Centre
items.short_description: Kaduna's newest state-of-the-art convention center, offering versatile spaces for large-scale conferences, exhibitions, and grand events. Equipped with modern technology and elegant design.
items.address: Off Ahmadu Bello Way, Ungwan Rimi, Kaduna
